modmenu.descriptionTranslation.atmosfera: An ambient sound system with customizable, atmospheric sound resources.
config.atmosfera.resource_pack_warning: No sound event was registered. Activate the built-in or a custom Atmosfera resource pack.
config.value.atmosfera.custom_music_weig:
"Weight" refers to the likelihood of music being played.
Normally, all music has the same weight.
The "Custom Music Weight Scale" increases the weight for
custom music, making it more likely to play over vanilla music.
Note that not all music can play at all places and that there's
usually a lot more vanilla music than custom music.
Typically, the ratio of vanilla to custom is around 27 to 3.
config.value.atmosfera.enable_custom_mus: Whether music from Atmosfera resource packs will be used or not
